internal.content:
---
title: Product documentation and PDFs
description: 
---

Most of the Merative™ Social Program Management documentation is currently available in PDF format only. Some further documentation is available in public GitHub repositories.

The sections on this page:

- [Cúram 8210](#curam-8210)
- [Cúram 8200](#curam-8200)
- [Cúram 813](#curam-813)
- [Cúram 812](#curam-812)
- [Merative Social Program Management 811](#merative-social-program-management-811)
- [Merative Social Program Management 810](#merative-social-program-management-810)
- [Merative Social Program Management 803](#merative-social-program-management-803)
- [Merative Social Program Management 802 and earlier](#merative-social-program-management-802-and-earlier)
- [Merative SPM Citizen Engagement](#merative-spm-citizen-engagement)
  - [Universal Access Responsive Web Application PDFs](#universal-access-responsive-web-application-pdfs)
  - [Social Program Management Design System PDFs](#social-program-management-design-system-pdfs)
- [Documentation addenda for 802](#documentation-addenda-for-802)
  - [Accessibility clarifications](#accessibility-clarifications)
  - [Authoring Scripts using Intelligent Evidence Gathering PDF](#authoring-scripts-using-intelligent-evidence-gathering-pdf)
  - [Clarification of IBM MQ support on Red Hat® OpenShift®](#clarification-of-ibm-mq-support-on-red-hat-openshift)
- [Social Program Management public GitHub documentation and repositories](#social-program-management-public-github-documentation-and-repositories)

## Cúram 8210
- [What's new in 8.2.1.0](/pdf/spm/Curam_WhatsNew_821.pdf)

   For important updates to the Social Program Management 8.0.2 documentation, see "Documentation Addenda for 8.0.2" on this page.

</InlineNotification>

## Merative SPM Citizen Engagement

The Merative SPM Universal Access Responsive Web Application and Merative SPM Design System assets are released more often than Social Program Management:

- PDF documentation for 5.3.1, 3.0.8, and 2.6.2 or later is available on this page.

<InlineNotification>
   If the following links don't work in Google Chrome, try opening them in a private/incognito window, or another browser, such as Mozilla Firefox.

## Documentation addenda for 802

### Accessibility clarifications

- For clarifications to Social Program Management's accessibility statement and conformance, browser zoom, section shortcut panel accessibility, and pod accessibility from February 2023, see the [Cúram Accessibility Guide PDF (February 2023)](/pdf/accessibility/CuramAccessibilityGuide_February2023.pdf).

### Authoring Scripts using Intelligent Evidence Gathering PDF

- For the QuickAddList feature updates to the "Display elements" section from September 2022, see the [Authoring Scripts using Intelligent Evidence Gathering (IEG) PDF (September 2022)](/pdf/CE/AuthoringScriptsUsingIEG_September22.pdf).

### Clarification of IBM MQ support on Red Hat® OpenShift®

- The following update applies to the [Messaging architecture](https://www.ibm.com/docs/en/spm/8.0.2?topic=architecture-messaging) page in the *Cúram on Kubernetes* section.

  This note requires clarification:
  
  **Note:** Social Program Management supports only IBM MQ on a VM. IBM MQ on Kubernetes, IBM MQ as a service, and other message engines have not been verified with Social Program Management.

  The note should read as follows:

  **Note:** Social Program Management supports IBM MQ LTS on VMs only. IBM MQ CD is supported only as a container on OpenShift. IBM MQ on Kubernetes, IBM MQ as a Service, and other message engines have not been verified with Social Program Management.

## Social Program Management public GitHub documentation and repositories

The following list outlines where you can find further documentation and resources in public GitHub repositories:

- [Cúram on Kubernetes Runbook](https://merative.github.io/curam-kubernetes/)
- [Cúram SPM Performance Tuning](https://github.com/merative/curam-performance-tuning)
- [Custom-UI-Reporter](https://github.com/merative/Custom-UI-Reporter)
- [Merative SPM UI Add-ons Development Environment](https://merative.github.io/spm-ui-addon-devenv/)
- [Merative SPM Virtual Assistant Cookbook](https://merative.github.io/spm-chatbot/)
- [SPM Citizen Engagement](https://github.com/Merative/spm-citizen-engagement/tree/main/custom-sso-mfa)

## Supporting Materials​

Security Bulletins and documentation for system generated Tasks & Notifications are
now available via the Merative Support Portal​


To access:​

- Log in to Merative Support <https://merative.my.site.com/mysupport/s/>​
- Enter your credentials​
- Navigate to Knowledge Base, then Article Search, select "Curam Knowledge" as the
Data Category Group and then select the relevant Data Category.​

​
If you don’t yet have access, please submit a request through the portal.​

## Documentation addenda for 802

### Accessibility clarifications

- For clarifications to Social Program Management's accessibility statement and conformance, browser zoom, section shortcut panel accessibility, and pod accessibility from February 2023, see the [Cúram Accessibility Guide PDF (February 2023)](/pdf/accessibility/CuramAccessibilityGuide_February2023.pdf).

### Authoring Scripts using Intelligent Evidence Gathering PDF

- For the QuickAddList feature updates to the "Display elements" section from September 2022, see the [Authoring Scripts using Intelligent Evidence Gathering (IEG) PDF (September 2022)](/pdf/CE/AuthoringScriptsUsingIEG_September22.pdf).

### Clarification of IBM MQ support on Red Hat® OpenShift®

- The following update applies to the [Messaging architecture](https://www.ibm.com/docs/en/spm/8.0.2?topic=architecture-messaging) page in the *Cúram on Kubernetes* section.

  This note requires clarification:
  
  **Note:** Social Program Management supports only IBM MQ on a VM. IBM MQ on Kubernetes, IBM MQ as a service, and other message engines have not been verified with Social Program Management.

  The note should read as follows:

  **Note:** Social Program Management supports IBM MQ LTS on VMs only. IBM MQ CD is supported only as a container on OpenShift. IBM MQ on Kubernetes, IBM MQ as a Service, and other message engines have not been verified with Social Program Management.

## Supporting Materials​

Security Bulletins and documentation for system generated Tasks & Notifications are
now available via the Merative Support Portal​


To access:​

- Log in to Merative Support <https://merative.my.site.com/mysupport/s/>​
- Enter your credentials​
- Navigate to Knowledge Base, then Article Search, select "Curam Knowledge" as the
Data Category Group and then select the relevant Data Category.​

​
If you don’t yet have access, please submit a request through the portal.​
